Dialogue.Page: Hey, hold up a sec!

DialogueOption.Text: Yeah yeah yeah, I already know about the launch codes.
Use the shiplog to track places I've been to. Got it! Thank you! Seeya!

Dialogue.Page: Aren't you gonna say goodbye to everyone before you take off? The whole village's gonna miss ya.
If anything, at least say bye to the little hatchlings. All of 'em seemed to have something to ask or say to you before you go.
Go humor 'em, just in case this is last they see of you for a while, y'know?

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, alright, I'll go talk to the little gills before I go.

Dialogue.Page: Uh, no. What are you talking about?
I was gonna ask if you were gonna say goodbye to everyone before you take off. The whole village's gonna miss you, you know?
If anything, at least say bye to the little hatchlings. All of 'em seemed to have something to ask or say to you before you go.
Go humor 'em as a favor for me - just in case this is last they see of you for a while, y'know?

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, alright, I'll go talk to the little gills before I go.

Dialogue.Page: Cool. Just remember: there's Mica, Tephra, Galena, Arkose, and Moraine.
If you forget to say goodbye to any one of them, they'll probably never forget it as long as they live.
I think Mica especially had something to ask you - but they didn't want to tell me what, for whatever reason.
I'm just saying: you probably wanna get it outta that one now. Otherwise, don't be surprised if you start seeing the model rocket flying after you with notes attached to it.
Stars, I don't know! I'm just roasting marshmallows and relaxing here. They're hatchlings, they might have clambered into your ship somehow for all I know.
Mica's probably still fiddling with the model rocket.
They told me they had something to ask you they couldn't tell me for whatever reason.. So it's probably plans to steal my job or something.
Tephra and Galena should be playing in the village somewhere.
I saw 'em trekking outside the village recently for whatever reason, though - so don't take my word on that.
Arkose's probably still throwing rocks into the patch of ghost matter at the top of the village.
Still uh.. no idea why they do that all day.
And Moraine's probably stargazing on the big tree in the village, making sure Marl doesn't chop it down.
I wonder if that Marl'll ever let go of that grudge.
No good in holding a grudge against a tree, you know?
That's all I know. Just get a move on - you'll probably just find all of 'em on the way up to the observatory for those launch codes, anyway!
